sourceMeaningMnemonic: A <radical>rain</radical> <radical>cloud</radical> is still a <kanji>cloud</kanji>! It's probably going to rain on you soon though, so I hope you have a jacket or an umbrella.
meaningInfo: Picture all of the different types of clouds in the sky. There are puffy white ones, heavy dark ones, and wispy thin ones. But they're all clouds.
readingMnemonic: You lie down and try to figure out what the <kanji>cloud</kanji>s are shaped like. The first cloud is shaped... like a <reading>coo</reading>l <reading>mo</reading>m (<ja>くも</ja>). She's wearing high pants, and holding a kid on each hip, but she's also listening to the latest music and using slang. Huh. You look to the next cloud and see... wait, another cool mom?
readingInfo: You look at each cloud and each one is a different cool mom. They're each doing different cool mom things. You suddenly don't want to look at the clouds anymore.
